title: Chicken Little: The True Story
description: An evil Foxloxian Army has broken through the planet’s atmosphere. The sky is falling. Commander Little must save the good people of Oakey Oaks (and the world).
quote: Civilization as we know it depends on me and, to a lesser extent… you.
altHero: Chicken Little as a cool action hero with sunglasses and headset
alt1: a spaceship flying through space and blowing up enemies
alt2: a fish in a cool futuristic helmet
alt3: a tough pig with big tusk teeth flying a small spacecraft
alt4: Chicken Little surrounded by townsfolk and holding a lady chicken friend and taking off via jetpack
